fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.io

Class CsvImporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.io.CsvImporter

  • public class CsvImporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class to import data in csv format, with one sample per line:
    attr1, attr2, ... , class position of the class label can be arbitrary
    Author:
    picard
